content:
# The furnace has successfully produced 1 iron plate while consuming 3 iron ore in the process, leaving 7 iron ore remaining.
# However, I still have not collected the iron plate into my inventory. 

# 20. **Collect the Iron Plate from the Furnace.**
# I will now retrieve the produced iron plate from the furnace to add it to my inventory.
collect_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace, quantity=1)  # Collect the iron plate from the furnace.

# 21. **Check the inventory again to confirm the iron plate has been collected.**
print(f"Updated Inventory after collecting the iron plate: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Show updated inventory after collection. 

# 22. **Check the furnace status again to confirm the remaining items.**
print(f"Final Furnace Status after collection: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")  # Show the furnace status after collection.
